entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: The Last Game
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 0,99¬†‚Ç¨ [0,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 3,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action / bullet-hell roguelite where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 130 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with 13 unique characters! BALANCE RISK & REWARD Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 13 unique characters! BECOME OVERPOWERED Over 130 unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth! FIND SECRETS Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villain to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials! PLAY WITH FRIENDS Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours! Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

Principais Funcionalidades: ‚Ä¢ Remover Metadados EXIF e Geotags: Proteja sua privacidade ao excluir dados EXIF, incluindo localiza√ß√£o GPS. ‚Ä¢ Visualizar Dados EXIF Detalhados: Acesse facilmente metadados essenciais como ISO, Velocidade do Obturador, Dist√¢ncia Focal, Modelo da C√¢mera, Modelo da Lente, Data e Hora, Abertura, e muito mais de qualquer foto em seu dispositivo, iCloud ou Foto Stream. ‚Ä¢ Ampliar Fotos Grandes: Aproveite imagens em alta resolu√ß√£o (at√© 80 MB) com clareza cristalina. ‚Ä¢ Personalizar suas Tags EXIF: Personalize sua visualiza√ß√£o ao reordenar as tags EXIF, ocultar tags indesejadas e escolher seu formato de data preferido. ‚Ä¢ Navega√ß√£o R√°pida: Deslize suavemente para a esquerda ou direita para navegar entre fotos na tela de detalhes EXIF. ‚Ä¢ Visualiza√ß√£o de Mapa: Visualize suas fotos em um mapa com informa√ß√µes EXIF detalhadas acess√≠veis ao tocar em cada foto. ‚Ä¢ Edi√ß√£o em Massa de Dados EXIF: Modifique os metadados EXIF de v√°rias fotos de forma eficiente, incluindo altera√ß√µes de data e localiza√ß√£o. ‚Ä¢ Compartilhar Fotos com ou sem EXIF: Compartilhe fotos via e-mail, AirDrop ou outros m√©todos, com ou sem os metadados EXIF. ‚Ä¢ Copiar Dados EXIF: Copie e compartilhe metadados facilmente entre apps. ‚Ä¢ Manter Metadados EXIF: Fotos enviadas via Mail, AirDrop ou leitores de cart√£o SD mant√™m os metadados EXIF, diferente de muitos aplicativos de mensagens e redes sociais. entry.title: Solo - Fretboard Visualization
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö17,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 9,99¬†‚Ç¨ [9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 17,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

Compras integradas

  • Custom Chord ProgressionsÔºö6,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Solo is the ultimate practice App for mastering fretboard visualization, designed by world renowned guitarists Tom Quayle and David Beebee. Four powerful fretboard trainers allow you to work intuitively on each aspect of the visualization process; learning note names, memorising interval shapes, outlining chord changes, and practicing scales. Solo asks you to find intervallic functions against one root note, chord symbol or scale at a time, listens to the notes you play, and doesn‚Äôt move on until you‚Äôve correctly found each note by its intervallic function in the specified order. Practice with Solo and finally learn your note names, master interval shapes, confidently play through chord changes and break out of scale boxes with intervallic functions. Start transforming your playing and confidence on the fretboard today! NOTE TRAINER The Note Trainer is perfect for beginner and intermediate players getting to grips with note names on the neck - the foundation of solid fretboard knowledge. ‚Ä£ Solo shows you random root notes to find and listens, waiting for you to get it correct. ‚Ä£ Slide on the interactive fretboards for helpful diagrams and to study alternative options. Choose from 6 string guitar (standard and 4ths tuning), 7 string guitar, 4 string bass & 5 string bass. ‚Ä£ Optional practice suggestions offer challenging ways to limit and test yourself. ‚Ä£ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session. INTERVAL TRAINER The Interval Trainer will help players at all levels work on interval shapes with intervallic functions - the key to unlocking true freedom on the fretboard. ‚Ä£ Choose any combination of intervallic functions to practice. ‚Ä£ Create custom interval groups or choose the intervals for ANY chord type or scale. ‚Ä£ The Interval Trainer will randomise your chosen intervals and ask you to find them against either a fixed or random root note. ‚Ä£ Slide on the interactive fretboards for helpful diagrams, showing you where all of the interval shapes are across the neck, and to study alternative options. Choose from 6 string guitar (standard and 4ths tuning), 7 string guitar, 4 string bass & 5 string bass. ‚Ä£ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session. CHANGES TRAINER In the Changes Trainer you find intervallic functions, using single notes to outline different chord types or sets of chord changes, a key skill for learning to improvise through chord changes. ‚Ä£ Practice outlining intervallic functions through over 100 common chord progressions and single chord exercises. ‚Ä£ 50 intervallic function levels. Go from simple chord tones to complex melodic structures and scales. ‚Ä£ Solo intelligently maps out the correct intervals over each chord and listens for you to play each intervallic function in the specified order. ‚Ä£ Powerful workout options provide almost limitless ways to challenge yourself. ‚Ä£ Transpose the key of any progression or exercise. ‚Ä£ Choose to randomly transpose the progression (or single chord exercise) each time it repeats. ‚Ä£ Work on voice leading chord tones through single note lines. SCALE TRAINER The Scale Trainer contains a vast array of scales and powerful workout options, allowing you to finally break out of the box and develop a much deeper understanding of how scales are constructed on the fretboard. ‚Ä£ Practice finding scales on the fretboard using intervallic functions. ‚Ä£ Over 50+ Scales and modes. ‚Ä£ Powerful workout options provide almost limitless ways to challenge yourself. ‚Ä£ Melodic sequence options let you focus on starting from any chord tone within the scale. ‚Ä£ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session.

For full terms and conditions, please see the License Agreement below. [Game Summary] A Naruto game full of 3D competitive action! NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM finally makes its way to smartphones! Experience the stories and battles of Naruto's childhood through beautiful graphics! Game Content Ultimate Mission Mode Relive the stories and famous battles from Naruto's childhood! You can freely move around the Hidden Leaf Village and take on missions and mini games! Compras integradas

  • Rocket Science PackÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

All Price Information

Application Description

Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors. UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat. WHAT IT DOES ‚Ä¢ Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around ‚Ä¢ Custom redirects (e.g. reddit ‚Üí old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns ‚Ä¢ Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them ‚Ä¢ Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services ‚Ä¢ Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more WHY IT'S USEFUL Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services. TRACKING BLOCKER Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices. URL REDIRECTS Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported. SEARCH ARCHIVE One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device. iCLOUD SYNC Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, and tweaks sync automatically and immediately. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere (statistics remain device-specific). BROWSER TWEAKS Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere. KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac ‚Ä¢ Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection) ‚Ä¢ Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity ‚Ä¢ Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically ‚Ä¢ Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps ‚Ä¢ Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules ‚Ä¢ Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users ‚Ä¢ Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering ‚Ä¢ Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity ‚Ä¢ Works offline - no internet connection required DESIGN PRINCIPLES Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms. IMPORTANT NOTES Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental. SUPPORT & FEEDBACK Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues PRIVACY No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device. EULA Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE? Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.
